SEARCH
Module FloWeekTracker
Package com.floweektracker.controller

Class TaskNamesController

java.lang.Object
com.floweektracker.controller.TaskNamesController
public class TaskNamesController extends Object
Controller for the TaskNamesDialog class. This class handles the interactions and logic related to managing task names, by communicating with TaskNamesService, TaskAddingDialogController, and TaskEditingDialogController.

Fields: taskNamesService, taskNamesDialog, taskAddingDialogController, taskEditingDialogController

Listeners methods: areComponentsHaveNoListeners(), createTaskNamesListListener(), createButtonsListener()

Helper methods: makeAction(Function), updateTaskNamesView()

Other methods: updateTaskNamesDialogs(String)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TaskNamesController(TaskAddingDialogController taskAddingDialogController, TaskEditingDialogController taskEditingDialogController)
    Creates a controller for the given TaskAddingDialogController and TaskEditingDialogController and sets listeners to the components of the taskNamesDialog if they don't have any.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • TaskNamesController

      public TaskNamesController(TaskAddingDialogController taskAddingDialogController, TaskEditingDialogController taskEditingDialogController)
      Creates a controller for the given TaskAddingDialogController and TaskEditingDialogController and sets listeners to the components of the taskNamesDialog if they don't have any.
      Parameters:

      taskEditingDialogController - a given TaskEditingDialogController
